ebay_title: Scuzzatti Quinn Men's Trousers Ice 50 Slim Fit
ebay_description_html:
Discover Quinn Men's Trousers in Ice from Scuzzatti. These trousers offer a sleek silhouette and a slim fit for all-day comfort, suitable for professional and casual settings.

  • Brand: Scuzzatti
  • Model: Quinn Men's Trousers
  • Color: Ice
  • Size: 50
  • Fit: Slim
  • Intended use: Professional and casual wear
  • Design notes: Sleek silhouette with all-day comfort
  • Styling options: Pairs well with a crisp shirt or lightweight sweater

output.name: optimize_for_ebay_title_description

tools.name: optimize_for_ebay_title_description

ebay_title.description:
Rules:
- ≤ 80 characters; one line (no newline).
- Start with brand/product; add 1–2 key details (model/size/color/material).
- No spammy phrases (e.g., FREE, BEST DEAL, 100%, GUARANTEED, SALE), no emojis.
- Avoid ALL-CAPS except model codes; no duplicate spaces.
- Natural, relevant keywords only.

ebay_description_html.description:
Rules: - ≤ 4000 characters; mobile-friendly HTML. - Structure: short lead paragraph (2–3 sentences) + 3–8 bullet points; optional simple specs table. - Allowed tags only:

, , ,
,

    ,
      ,
    • , , , , , , , . - Do NOT use active content or disallowed tags: script, iframe, object, embed, applet, form, input, button, video, audio, canvas, svg, style, link, meta. - Accurate, non-promotional language; no external links/contact info.
      , ,
      ,

tools.description: Return an eBay-optimized title (<=80 chars) and a compliant HTML description (<=4000 chars, no active content).
